content.value: RollinKeepers House is located in Cali and offers a shared lounge and on-site bike rental. It is just a 10-minute walk from the city centre and features free WiFi.
The dormitory rooms here feature bright d√©cor and come equipped with a shared bathroom with a shower and toilet. They also include towels and linens.
At RollinKeepers House you will find a garden and a shared kitchen. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, which include kite-surf, wake-board, and bicycle rentals.
Restaurants and bars are available within a 5-minute walk, while Alfonso Bonilla Aragon International Airport is just a 30-minute drive away while the bus terminal is 2 km away.

Services:
-Kitchen
-Common areas
-Hot shower
-Free Wifi
-TV and Netflix
-Laundry

Activities
-Salsa Lessons
-Spanish Courses
-Bike Tours
-Bike Rental
-Kitesurf, kiteland and wakeboard lessons
-Paragliding flights
-San Cipriano Tour
-Calima Lake Tour

And much more adventures.

description.description: RollinKeepers House is the closest to Cali bus terminal only 2 k.m away. We are located 10 min from historical zone and surrounded by good restaurants and bars perfect for night life in a safe neighborhood.
